content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
I had David and Daniel as my servers. They were both incredibly kind and patient given how turnt me and my partner were. Food came out quickly and everything was delicious! We were even given water bottles to go!Thank you again for being so nice to us, we'll definitely be coming back to Seoul Night as our pre-game/late night spot :)
